about_the_game:
Control two cute dragons at the same time in a voluminous puzzle game.

"DragonMirroreD" is a puzzle + adventure game featuring two dragons, Hyoga and Magma, who are trapped in a mysterious house.
The house contains over 300 puzzle "rooms". Once inside the "rooms," Hyoga and Magma will move symmetrically.
The puzzle is cleared when all of the orbs, called crystals, with various characteristics in the "rooms" are picked up.
Many unique gimmicks may block your way. Sometimes you have to use them against them to solve the puzzle.

The demo version allows you to enjoy puzzles taken from the actual trial version.
The same puzzles appear in the full version, so if you find them interesting, you should discontinue playing the demo version and enjoy the full version!

demo version updated. 7-22-2024 Corrected a typo.
